characters.title: Aang
characters.content: The last Airbender and the Avatar, tasked with restoring balance to the world.

characters.title: Katara
characters.content: A skilled waterbender and Aang's loyal friend, who helps him on his journey.

characters.title: Zuko
characters.content: The exiled Fire Nation prince on a quest to capture Aang but later seeking redemption.

characters.title: Azula
characters.content: Zuko's cunning and ruthless sister, a formidable firebender and antagonist.

characters.title: Sokka
characters.content: Katara's brother, a warrior, and comic relief, who becomes a key part of the group.

characters.title: Toph
characters.content: A blind earthbender with extraordinary skills in metalbending.
